Package org.ietf.nea.pt.socket

IETF socket transport connection.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Authenticator
    Generic authentication handler for an IETF socket transport connection.
    Negotiator
    Generic version negotiation handler for an IETF socket transport connection.
    Receiver
    Generic message receiver for an IETF socket transport connection.
    SocketHandler
    Generic socket handler to hold a socket and mask its functions for the management of the contained socket.
    SocketMessenger
    Generic message handler to hold a socket and mask its functions for the transmission and receipt of TNC messages thru the contained socket.
    SocketWrapper
    Generic wrapper to encapsulate a socket and mask its functions for the transmission and receipt of TNC messages thru the contained socket and for the management of the contained socket.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SocketTransportConnectionPhaseEnum
    Enumeration of known transport connection phases.
